alert.note: Alert for Knox (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 6:45AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Knox County through 715 AM CDT... At 644 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Rio, or 13 miles north of Galesburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oneida around 700 AM CDT. Altona around 705 AM CDT. Victoria around 710 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 34 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
